meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>leader</radical> sticks his <radical>toe</radical> into a <radical>shellfish</radical>. You ask him why and he says he wants to <kanji>spy</kanji> on it.
readingMnemonic: You and the leader review the <kanji>spy</kanji> footage and find a single <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tot hidden within the shellfish. Together you uncover a huge smuggling ring. Clams, oysters, mussels, you name it! Shellfish of all kinds are using their bodies to sneak tater tots to the undersea world.
